abstract.text: OpenAPI “Schema Object”
A schema context stores information about a schema.
All schemas can have the contextual information in
this protocol.
The context that only applies to
schemas.
exists to provide a parent protocol to
and
. The structure is designed to provide default no-op
implementations of both the members of this protocol to all types that implement either
of the child protocols.

OpenAPI “Schema Object”
Get the core context most JSONSchemas have.
types allow their descriptions to be overridden to facilitate

can specify a description to be used instead of
whatever description the referenced object has.
